title: Call Request v1
description: Request to invoke another envelope (second-order speech act).

target_envelope_id.description: Full identifier of the envelope to invoke (e.g., 'env.repo_snapshot_run_v1', 'env.context7_docs_fetch_v1').

target_envelope_version.description: Optional version/variant of the target envelope, if needed for disambiguation.

data.description: Payload for the target envelope (corresponds to the target envelope's input/data structure).

call_context.description: Optional additional service fields for the call (trace id, correlation id, priority, etc., for future use).
